de: Facing the Mastrou train station, the table des Négociants offers you a gourmet panorama of Ardèche specialities: meal salad, entrecote with ceps, ravioli, trout, homemade ice cream. Home cooking, made with our many local products. Simple welcome. Sunny terrace.
ru: Facing the Mastrou train station, the table des Négociants offers you a gourmet panorama of Ardèche specialities: meal salad, entrecote with ceps, ravioli, trout, homemade ice cream. Home cooking, made with our many local products. Simple welcome. Sunny terrace.
en: Facing the Mastrou train station, the table des Négociants offers you a gourmet panorama of Ardèche specialities: meal salad, entrecote with ceps, ravioli, trout, homemade ice cream. Home cooking, made with our many local products. Simple welcome. Sunny terrace.
it: Facing the Mastrou train station, the table des Négociants offers you a gourmet panorama of Ardèche specialities: meal salad, entrecote with ceps, ravioli, trout, homemade ice cream. Home cooking, made with our many local products. Simple welcome. Sunny terrace.
fr: Face à la gare du Mastrou, la table des Négociants vous offre un panorama gourmand des spécialités ardéchoises. Une cuisine maison, faite avec nos nombreux produits locaux. Accueil en toute simplicité. Terrasse ensoleillée.
zh: Facing the Mastrou train station, the table des Négociants offers you a gourmet panorama of Ardèche specialities: meal salad, entrecote with ceps, ravioli, trout, homemade ice cream. Home cooking, made with our many local products. Simple welcome. Sunny terrace.
es: Facing the Mastrou train station, the table des Négociants offers you a gourmet panorama of Ardèche specialities: meal salad, entrecote with ceps, ravioli, trout, homemade ice cream. Home cooking, made with our many local products. Simple welcome. Sunny terrace.
nl: De table des Négociants, tegenover het station van Mastrou, biedt u een gastronomisch panorama van specialiteiten uit de Ardèche: maaltijdsalade, entrecote met eekhoorntjesbrood, ravioli, forel, huisgemaakt ijs. Home cooking, gemaakt met onze vele lokale producten. Eenvoudig welkom. Zonnig terras.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme du Pays de Lamastre

de:
Kein Service am: Montagmittag.
Im Winter auch am Sonntagabend.
en:
No service on: Monday noon.
Also on sunday evening in winter.
it:
Non è in servizio il lunedì a pranzo.
Anche la domenica sera in inverno.
fr:
Pas de service les :  lundis midi. 
Egalement le dimanche soir l'hiver.
es:
No hay servicio los lunes al mediodía.
También los domingos por la noche en invierno.
nl:
Geen dienst op: maandagmiddag.
Ook op zondagavond in de winter.
